info.brief_description: All Aidan has ever wanted is to be fat, today his wish is granted.
info.description:
Aidan has always wanted to be fat, more than that, obese. Unfortunately he is as skinny as a rail and is afraid of the consequences of pursuing his fantasy. All of that changes when he wakes up one morning gigantic! Explore this massive change with him and see what it really means to be huge!

The goal of this story is not weight gain but rather the experience of being huge. I don't want to read that in one meal he gained 300 pounds. Furthemore, keep things realistic. This is a teenage boy who goes to public school, he has no interest in being bed bound or not being able to live some semblance of a normal life.

Once again, realism. While it is assumed that this weight isn't going to create any illness it will probably cause other "health problems" ie: difficulty with mobility and physical activities causing shortness of breath, sweating, even fainting. Imagine if you had to always carry around the weight of one or more people the same weight as yourself, that isn't easy!

Anyway, have fun and hope you enjoy!
